availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Normandes G. Forkner (Powell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Montgomery County, Kentucky, native. Son of Jonas Forkner and Nancy Forkner. Married to Sarah E. Garrett Forkner in Powell County, Kentucky, on December 30, 1858. Father of Harriett Forkner, John W. Forkner, and Adeline Forkner. Student in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 51B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, p. 14-15.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Precinct 2, p. 135A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Powell County, KY, October 1863, p. 130.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994053, Powell County Marriages.
